home.hero_subtitle: Premium Sugarcane Arrack crafted with tradition and passion.
home.production_desc: Experience the journey of our single-estate sugarcane arrack, distilled in traditional copper pot stills.

about.title: Our Heritage
about.story_text: Founded in the heart of Sri Lanka's sugarcane belt, Galoya Arrack represents centuries of distillation expertise. We believe in the purity of ingredients and the patience of time.
about.team_text: Our team combines modern science with ancient wisdom to create spirits of exceptional character.

brand.title: The Galoya Brand
brand.story: Galoya is more than a drink; it's a celebration of Sri Lankan terroir. Our arrack captures the essence of the tropical sun and the fertile soil of the Gal Oya valley.

products.title: Our Collection
products.subtitle: Explore our range of premium arracks.
products.no_sales: Available exclusively at licensed bars and wine shops.

sustainability.title: Sustainable by Nature
sustainability.plantation_text: We grow our own sugarcane, ensuring quality from the ground up. Our farming practices respect the local ecosystem.
sustainability.community_text: We define success by the well-being of our community, providing fair employment and supporting local initiatives.

portfolio.title: Our Portfolio
portfolio.subtitle: A curated collection of our community initiatives, sustainable practices, and distillery moments.
